hasCapacity

public CapacityValue hasCapacity()
Returns the CapacityValue of the ArticleProducer.

Specified by:
hasCapacity in interface ArticleProducerInterface
Returns:
CapacityValue PRODUCER_SHUTDOWN if the ArticleProducer has entered the shutdown mode CACHE_LIMIT_REACHED if the cache limit has been reached TASK_LIMIT_REACHED if the number of tasks limit has been reached FREE otherwise
